title: What are the information technology courses available for commerce graduates? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here I am giving you name of some best Computer Courses to get software jobs after passing B com course below : Post graduate diploma in software engineering (PGDSE)Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Software Technology(PGDCST)Advance Diploma in Computer Software Technology(ADCST)Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications / Information TechnologyAdvanced Diploma in ComputerApplications / Information TechnologyComputer Teacher’s TrainingAdvanced Diploma in TelecomDiploma in Computer HardwareAdvanced Diploma in Hardware &Networking (ADCHMN)Diploma in Networking Technology Students who are interested in computer programming stuff and are really good in mathematics can opt for computer programming courses like MCA. *(Searched some stuff from google.)
